Verb *load*
************

Documentation for the load verb in */cmds/verbs/load.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``load <something> with <something>``
 |  ``load <something> in <something>``

Load your gun with ammo, load ammo into your shotgun, ready your crossbow with a bolt.
